text: Thaniye is a 2007 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Babu Thiruvalla, starring Nedumudi Venu and Lakshmi Gopalaswamy in the lead roles. http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/3808/malayalam/thaniye/index.htm ==Cast== * KPAC Lalitha * Nedumudi Venu * Ashokan * Vijay Menon * Lakshmi Gopalaswamy * Mamukkoya * NK Gopalakrishnan * Nedumpram Gopi * Sreekala * M. B. Padmakumar == Award == * TV award for editing in 2008. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Thaniye
